hey can anyone plese help me understand this....i have been breaking my head for a week and still don't get it. can anyone use xgd3 or do u need an ihas burner to play these..i have a hitachi with all the latest on it,can somebody help me please.

@ the_champ108 XGD3 is the latest game format that MS is using. The XGD3 discs contain more data than the older XGD2 games, so much data that they no longer fit onto a standard dual layer dvd. There are 2 ways around this, you can either buy an ihas burner which will allow you to burn 100% of game data onto a standard disc OR you can use the trudicate method to burn the game with a standard dvd burner. this trudicate method will miss off the last 5% of disc data but as this is just disc padding it will not effect the game play, however it will make the disc visible when playing online and therefore you may be banned from xbox live. 

Either way to play XGD3 games you need to upgrade drive firmware if your console is flashed, you should ideally use LT3.0 but these XGD3 games will work on LT2.0 if you patch before burning with the downgrader.
